Forecasting in Power BI

I have written and talked about Time Series Forecasting, especially on how to create forecasts in Power BI. You can refer to my previous blog posts below:

Time series Forecasting in Python & R, Part 1 (EDA): Link This blog covers exploratory data analysis techniques for time series data before creating the forecast.

Time series Forecasting in Python & R, Part 2 (Forecasting): Link Here I go into theoretical and practical aspects of creatings forecasts using many different classical forecasting methods

Time series Forecasting in Power BI: Link This blog shows how to create forecasts in Power BI, its strengths, limitations, and my recommendations.

I recently presented on this topic at Global AI Bootcamp, Singapore. Here is the recording of that presentation. It summarizes my findings from the blog above.
